name: Afro Hair
description:
To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for No-Bake Chocolate Haystacks ~

Ingredients

  • 1 cup Sugar

  • 1/4 cup milk

  • 1/4 cup butter

  • 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract

  • 2 Tablespoons cocoa powder, heaping

  • 1 1/2 cups oats

  • 1/2 cup shredded coconut, sweetened or unsweetened

Instructions

Add the sugar, milk and butter to a medium pot and bring to a rolling boil over medium heat.

Add cocoa and and let boil for 1.5 to 2 minutes (don’t over boil it).

Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

Add the oats and coconut and stir until completely combined.

Spoon onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

Allow to cool at room temperature for about half an hour or until firm.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

DO NOT REUPLOAD

name: Fantasy Race Fusions of The WeepingWizard
description:
Little known fact is the WeepingWizard pub is actually a ruse to lure in these fantasy races, get them drunk, harvest their DNA, and create mutants in the underground laboratory. But you didn't hear this from me.
Lots of information to cover given this first version essentially merges all of my other loras thus far into a single mega lora. This allows you to create night elves, draenei, eredar, various orcs, blood elves, void elves, and dark rangers from World of Warcraft or alternatively to fuse them together into monstrosities of your making. It can be a bit difficult to control if you fuse them though, especially if you try to do more than two races at a time. Going forward I might do these fusion loras more rarely just so I can get more races out. Future versions while either be similar to this one or potentially more targeted towards a particular fusion of two specific races, but again, probably will be fairly rare I do more of these as I focus on individual race loras. Added some extra images, in total it's about 800 in this fusion. Importantly I adjusted some tags from the previous ones, so be sure to use the tags listed in this description. Clip Skip 2.

Lora Weight 1.2
Night Elf Trigger: wwnightelfwow
Night Elf Gender Tags: wownightelf male, wownightelf female
Body Tags (Ears, Brows, Eyes, Skin Color): elf, long pointy ears, night elf ears, nightelf brows, [COLOR] eyes, woweyes, [COLOR] woweyes, colored sclera, [COLOR] sclera, glowing eyes, colored skin, [COLOR] skin
Facepaint Tags: facepaint, night elf facepaint, [COLOR] facepaint
Bodypaint Tags: bodypaint, night elf bodypaint, [COLOR] bodypaint

Draenei/Eredar Trigger: wwdraeneiwow
Draenei/Eredar Gender Tags: wwdraenei male, wwdraenei female
Eredar Tag: eredar
Eredar Wings: wings, demon wings
Extra Male Tags: muscular male, broad shoulders
Extra Eredar Female Tags: muscular female
Body Tags (Horns, Ears, Eyes, Tentacles, Skin Color, Tail): horns, draenei horns, pointy ears, draenei ears, [COLOR] eyes, woweyes, [COLOR] woweyes, colored sclera, [COLOR] sclera, glowing eyes, headtenta, headtenta ornaments, colored skin, [COLOR] skin, tail, draenei tail, tail ornaments
Facepaint Tags: facepaint, draenei facepaint, [COLOR] facepaint
Bodypaint Tags: bodypaint, draenei bodypaint, [COLOR] bodypaint

Orc Trigger: wworcwow
Orc Gender Tags: wworc male, wworc female
Extra Male Tags: muscular, muscular male, broad shoulders, abs
Extra Female Tags: toned, toned female
Body Tags (Ears, Tusks, Skin Color): orc, pointy ears, orc ears, tusks, orc tusks, colored skin, [COLOR] skin
Maghar Reinforcement: maghar
Bloodlust Eyes Reinforcement Tags: bloodlust eyes, red eyes, red sclera, glowing eyes
Tusk Details (Challenging): tusk ornaments, chipped tusk
Piercing Tags: piercing, earrings, nose ring, lip ring
Facepaint Tags: facepaint, orc facepaint, [COLOR] facepaint
Bodypaint Tags: bodypaint, orc bodypaint, [COLOR] bodypaint
Necklace With Tusks: tusk necklace

Blood Elf/Void Elf/Dark Ranger Trigger: wwbevedrwow
Belf/Velf/DR Gender Tags: wowbelfvelfdr male, wowbelfvelfdr female
Blood Elf/Void Elf Reinforcement Tags (Dark Rangers use Neither): wwbloodelfwow, wwvelfwow
Blood Elves With Void Elves Together: mixedelves
Body Tags (Ears, Brows, Eyes, Skin Color): elf, long pointy ears, belfvelfdr ears, belfvelfdr brows, [COLOR] eyes, woweyes, [COLOR] woweyes, colored sclera, [COLOR] sclera, glowing eyes, colored skin, [COLOR] skin
Ears Through Hats/Hoods: ears through headwear
Facepaint Tags: facepaint, belfvelfdr facepaint, [COLOR] facepaint
Bodypaint Tags: bodypaint, belfvelfdr bodypaint, [COLOR] bodypaint
Blood Knight Armor: bloodknight, red trim, armor, shoulder armor, pauldrons, tabard, breastplate, gauntlets

General Tags
Magic Tags: wowfel magic, wowlight magic, wowthunder magic, wowfire magic, wowwater magic, wowfrost magic, wowshadow magic, wowsmoke magic, wowarcane magic, wownightmare magic, wownature magic, wowvoid magic
Class Tags: wowpaladin, wowrogue, wowhunter, wowpriest, wowwarlock, wowwarrior, wowmage, wowmonk, wowshaman, wowdruid, wowdk
Demon Hunter Specific: wowdh, blindfold, eyes visible through blindfold, demhun wings, wings, demon wings, horns, demhun horns, bodypaint, green bodypaint, demhun bodypaint
Sexy Clothes: wowlingerie
Basic Clothes: wowcommon

Experimental Tags
Orbs of Magic: magicorb
Rune Bodypaint Tag: rune bodypaint
Symbol Tags (Rough): horde symbol, alliance symbol, kirintor symbol, belf symbol

Negatives:
gradient ears
(Keeps a consistent color on the ears. Probably the most important one.)
visibleiris
(Might not work? In theory helps avoid a visible iris/pupil when doing blood elf eyes.)
colored skin, [COLOR] skin
(If you get a skin color you don't want, or if you don't want colored skin at all then consider this.)
(shaved hair:1.5)
(Most important for orc females given their hairstyle tends to be half-shaven.)

Probably Failed Multiple Race Tags:
multirace, bloodelfwdraenei, bloodelfwnightelf, draeneiwnightelf, draeneiworc, nightelfworc

I think that covers everything? Again, future versions will either be the same but with more races or they might be more targeted pairings of two races. Additionally, future versions of fusions will be less frequent.

name: O, Stars, What Have You Sent? [Illustrious]
description:
O, Stars, What Have You Sent?

Laconic:

O, Stars, What Have You Sent? is a LoRA trained on a peculiar mix of images that will infuse a mix of kitsch science fiction and brooding dark fantasy into your generations. Alongside these genres you'll find an abundance of extraneous LED HUDs, high-concept lighting, décor resembling faux nimbi and infusions of bright but menacing backlighting. Lastly, you may find hints of both tarot card design for the images and the occasional cosmic visitor.

Loquacious:

Some of my earliest experiments in generating images with any sort of AI resulted in a series of "cards" - some with distinct, tarot-esque borders, some without - featuring art that dipped heavily into sci-fi with frequent appearances of unusual architecture or looming entities in the sky. They gave off a mood of looming wonder and terror as spacefaring humans came to terms with the unknowable. "O, stars, what have you sent?" was the question I imagined they would ask, unable to comprehend the idea that the galaxy is far more alien than they could have imagined.

Some optional prompt keywords that you may find useful:

sci-fi, science fiction, fantasy, stars \(sky\), alien [object or entity], moody, atmospheric, horror, cosmic [entity], eldritch [entity], tarot, tarot card art

Of course, this was just a broad interpretation of mine when seeing the results of my early generations. I like to attach stories to things.

This is about my 3rd or 4th attempt to get this LoRA to "work" to an extent that it would seem to actually have any significant effect if used. Truthfully, I'm not 100% sure that I've really accomplished that on this latest attempt either, which is why I'm calling it a beta version.

If you're someone that decides to make use of this weird, incredibly niche LoRA and you see areas where you think it can be improved, don't hesitate to let me know.

name: Giant Furries, Growth and Stuck
description:
Concept for giant furries, unexpected growth, getting stuck in places too small. Trigger words are:

- growthgiant: city sized

- growthmacro: bigger than city

- stuckin: partly stuck inside a structure

- stuckbetween: stuck between 2 structures

- stuckinspace: cramped in a small space

- footstomp: foot about or is crushing the observer or object

- asthegiant: pov from the giant

- crushingthings: on top of structures crushing them

The triggers are not as effective as I was hoping but it helps to use some standard tags to help out:

- view angles: from front, from rear, from side, from below, from above, pov, overhead view

- position: sitting, standing, lying, on back, on belly, on side,

- stuck in things: cramped, stuck, hole in building, hand on building, hand on wall, hand on ground, foot on wall, foot on building, behind building,

- destruction: cracks in building, destruction, crushing

- other: macro, giant

It turned out to be pretty sensitive to 'belly' words so be careful, or don't. Helps with 'stuck' concepts but makes the subject always very large:

- big belly, hyper belly, fat rolls, fat, sagging,

First time doing this for me so looking forward to see what others make of it. Quality could be improved a lot I know.

I have a few other personal loras I'm thinking of uploading, all mostly furry growth related sfw.

name: Resistance Game
description:
I tried to find models related to the Resistance game universe on the internet, but I couldn't find anything. So I decided to create my own model. This is the Lora model based on the Resistance universe. I had to search for a lot of photos, including those from all parts of the game, to create this model.
The model is based on photos from the fall of man, parts 2 and 3. There is also some weapons in the photos, especially the M5A2, the main carbine of the Earth soldiers.

In general, Lora focused on creating chimeras, but she can also draw SRPA soldiers.

As for the NSFW features, they are also available. If you want, you can draw a female chimera, although it is already too much.

name: Ethereal Echoes: Aqueous Emotion
description:
Ethereal Echoes: Aqueous Emotion - Immerse yourself in the emotion of watercolor

Welcome to "Ethereal Echoes: Aqueous Emotion" - a Lora model designed to breathe life into your visions with depth, emotion and the unique charm of traditional watercolor and ink brush. This model is trained to capture the essence of loneliness, sadness and nostalgia, transmitted through transparent layers, expressive brush and fine symbolism.

Why "Ethereal Echoes: Aqueous Emotion"?

Authentic watercolor style: Enjoy the natural transmissions, the visible texture of paper and soft, but at the same time detailed lines characteristic of hand -painted watercolors.

Emotional depth: The model specializes in the transmission of strong emotional states - from quiet melancholy to deep sadness, making every image impactful.

Versatility: Whether you want portraits, landscapes or conceptual scenes, "Ethereal Echoes" will transform them into emotional works of art.

Precision in detail: Pay attention to the subtle elements and reflections that add layers of story to your generations.

Available options:

Ethereal Echoes SDXL (Recommended!)

What it is for: This option is specifically designed for Stable Diffusion XL and is the best choice for exceptional detail, photorealistic watercolor textures and maximum faithfulness to the promotion. SDXL allows longer and complex promotions, which will unleash the full potential of "Ethereal Echoes" in its authentic watercolor precision.

Use with: Recommended model SDXL BASE (V1.0 or newer).

Ethereal Echoes Pony (experimental / art style)

What is it for: This option is optimized for Pony Diffusion and similar models aimed at more stylized and often more aesthetic, "Anime-Like" or "Fantasy-Art" output. "Ethereal Echoes Pony" will add a unique watercolor taste and emotional charge to your pony generations, adding the depth of characters and scenes in this specific art style.

Use with: Pony Diffusion V6 (or other Pony Base models).

Ethereal Echoes Illustration (General Illustrative Style)

What it is for: This option is more flexible and is designed to work with a wider range of basic models (eg SD 1.5, some Finetunes), applying the overall illustrative aesthetics of "Ethereal Echoes" with a more pronounced watercolor and brush effect, but it may not be as photo-reference. It is ideal if you are looking for an artistic, hand -painted look with an emotional charge without being bound by a specific basic model.

Use with: Any common or finely tuned SD 1.5 model.

How to get started:

Choose the option that best suits your basic model and creative needs. Use the positive and negative labels provided to direct the model to the desired results. Experiment with Lora weight for different levels of style intensity.

Immerse yourself in the world of Ethereal Echoes: Aqueous Emotion and create visually influential and deeply emotional works of art!

name: Civitai レコーディング少女 / キャラソンCDとかの表紙で使われるやつ Recording Girl / Character Song CD-style Illustration
description:
レコーディングスタジオで歌う少女

イメージ的に目指していたのはキャラソンCDとかでCDイメージ表紙に使われるヘッドフォンで音楽聞いてたり歌ってたりするやつ

元々プロンプトで出るが雰囲気、構図の安定感に欠けるため作成

と言ってもLora式にしてもまだ安定感にかけている気がするが

元の画像構図としては片手でヘッドフォンを押さえ、立ちながら歌うようなポーズ（斜め二種、横向き一種）

向き指定プロンプトを入れない場合、大体斜め。意図して指定する場合、facing away や side angle, side view,

前向きはpov, front view

ケーブルが邪魔な感じがするので学習元画像では付けてない

とはいえモデル側のケーブル学習が強いのか割と出てきたりはしてた

そのため、プロンプト用語としては wireless headphones を推奨。

■推奨強度

0.8前後（補助的なもののため、別段下げて使っても問題は無い）

■用途的に合わせた切り替え

歌う

microphone, または microphone stand, ＋ singing や open mouth,

キャラソンCDの表紙チックなやつ（片目、口閉じ、口角上げ笑み）

one eye closed, (closed mouth:2),

corners of own mouth turned up, smile,

■推奨ネガティブ

holding microphone stand, holding microphone,

何かマイク掴みがち

■微妙なとこ

全般：頭に耳とか物体あるとヘッドフォンの一部に取り込むかもしれない

歌う：巨乳にするとマイクスタンド側は干渉しがち

■その他

レコーディングマイクの丸板、ポップガードは学習の時点では外してる

🔸 Description

This LoRA is trained to generate anime-style illustrations of a girl singing in a recording studio – the kind of artwork often seen on character song CD covers.

The image evokes a mood of studio recording, with the girl wearing headphones and often holding one side of them while singing.

The original model struggled to maintain consistent composition and atmosphere with prompts alone, so this LoRA was designed to support more stable results.

However, composition consistency is still a work in progress.


🔹 Training Composition Reference:

The girl stands while singing

Holding one side of the headphones with one hand

Shot angles include:

2 diagonal views

1 side-facing view

If no direction prompt is given, the generation defaults to diagonal angles.

You can control direction with:

side angle, side view, facing away

pov, front view for frontal poses


Note: No headphone cables were included in training images, as they often caused interference.

Still, cable generation occasionally occurs due to the base model’s learned bias.

→ To reduce this, it’s recommended to use wireless headphones in the prompt.


🔸 Recommended Strength

Around 0.8 (designed as a support-type LoRA, can be used at lower strengths as needed)


🔸 Prompt Suggestions

🎤 Singing Pose:

microphone, microphone stand, singing, open mouth

📀 Character Song CD-style Pose:

(closed mouth:2), one eye closed, corners of mouth turned up, smile


🔸 Negative Prompt Suggestions

These elements tend to appear unintentionally. Add them to the negative prompt as needed:

holding microphone, holding microphone stand


🔸 Known Issues / Notes

Headphones may merge with ears or other accessories placed on the head

Microphone stands may intersect with the chest if used with large breast settings

Pop filters (round mesh screens on studio mics) were excluded during training

name: BJD - Ball Jointed Doll
description:
To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for Homemade Oatmeal Cream Pies ~

Ingredients

For the Cookies

  • 1 cup unsalted butter softened

  • ¾ cup firmly packed light brown sugar

  • ½ cup granulated sugar

  • 2 large eggs

  • 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

  • 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour

  • 1 teaspoon baking soda

  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

  • ½ teaspoon salt

  • 3 cups quick or old fashioned oats

For the Cream Filling

  • ¾ cup unsalted butter softened

  • 2 ½ cups confectioners’ sugar sifted

  • 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

  • 1 tablespoon milk or half and half

Instructions

Preheat oven to 350°F. Line cookie sheets with parchment paper.

In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, or in a large bowl with an electric mixer, cream together butter and sugars until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Add in eggs and vanilla and mix until combined.

1 cup unsalted butter,3/4 cup firmly packed light brown sugar,1/2 cup granulated sugar,2 large eggs,1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt. Slowly add the flour mixture to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Add in oats and mix until incorporated.

1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour,1 teaspoon baking soda,1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,1/2 teaspoon salt,3 cups quick or old fashioned oats

To make large cookies, use a large cookie scoop (about 3 tablespoons) to drop dough onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake in preheated oven for 13-15 minutes or until golden brown. To make small cookies, use a medium cookie scoop (about 1.5 tablespoons) of dough per cookie and bake for 10-12 minutes.

Allow cookies to sit on cookie sheets for about 5 minutes before removing them to a wire rack to cool completely. Once cookies have cooled completely, prepare the cream filling.

Prepare the Cream Filling:

In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat butter on medium-high speed for about 5 minutes. This process will lighten the color of the butter and ensure you buttercream in extra fluffy.

3/4 cup unsalted butter

Turn the speed down to low and gradually add in the powdered sugar. Continue mixing on low speed until the powdered sugar is completely incorporated. Add in vanilla extract and milk and mix until combined.

2 1/2 cups confectioners’ sugar,1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract,1 tablespoon milk or half and half

Turn mixer back up to medium-high speed and beat the mixture for an additional 3-5 minutes. If needed, add in a little more milk or half-and-half 1 teaspoon at a time until you reach the consistency you desire.

To assemble the cookies, pipe or spread the cream filling on the flat side of half of the cookies and put the remaining cookies on top.

name: See-through body | Experimental
description:
v1 - Large

The same dataset as v1 - Normal on a lora that is twice as large. Results seem promising, but your feedback would be appreciated.

v1 - Normal

With an enhanced dataset the results are improved. There is still a strong style influence which biases the results towards an anime style and backgrounds exhibit overfitting. Effect works best when the background is a repeating pattern (like stone walls, concrete paths) or includes elements that extend across the subject (windows, edges etc). Although it was not tagged for this at all, adding "see-through head" may improve the transparency of the head when used in addition to "see-through body".

Adding tags like "see-through clothes" to the negative can get a more invisible girl style. Some issues may also be solved by adding "tattoo" to the negative.

v0

Proof of concept: This is a proof of concept for training a concept on synthetic and modified imagery. The initial dataset was very small and the resulting model is overbaked but shows signs of concept comprehension.

Method Explainer

v0 and v1 were trained entirely on synthetic data created by generating a subject and a background independently and then compositing a semi-transparent subject over a background using image editing software.

This approach has an obvious downside, that the two components are not well integrated. How then to create a full body subject oriented correctly to the viewing angle of the background? My solution was to turn to my favourite tool, the lineart controlnet.
The initial prompt was:

1girl, standing, full body, turning around, looking back, long blonde hair, red jacket, blue jeans, park, grass, bench, concrete path, masterpiece, best quality, amazing detail, high definition

Which could then be modified for the isolated subject:

1girl, standing, full body, turning around, looking back, long blonde hair, red jacket, blue jeans, simple background, masterpiece, best quality, amazing detail, high definition

and a background prompt:

no humans, park, grass, bench, concrete path, masterpiece, best quality, amazing detail, high definition

Masking out the subject becomes much easier with a simple background. Then it can be superimposed as a transparent subject over a fully detailed background. Even using a model that didn't understand "see-through body" we were still able to create synthetic training data so that it could learn it. Pretty neat!

Before this I had no idea if this was a viable approach. The results, while not incredible, are better than I was expecting.

name: kirakira glowing (fighting  aura / qi)
description:
kirakira, glowing, aura, fighting stance, holding weapon,  holding { sword, | katana, | light saber,| rapier, | polearm, |buster sword, |magic circle, |wand,  }

Kirakira Glowing / Fighting Aura/ Qi/ Ki

Concept Definition: Glowing Fighting Aura, known as "ki" (気) in Japanese or "qi" (氣) in Chinese, represents the visual manifestation of a character's life force, spiritual energy, or fighting power. This concept transforms an abstract internal energy into a visible, luminous field surrounding the character.

Visual Characteristics:

  • Luminous energy fields emanating from the character's body

  • Colors typically represent different states, emotions, or power levels

  • Intensity correlates with the character's strength or emotional state

  • Often accompanied by environmental effects like wind, debris, or energy distortion

Cultural Origins: The concept draws from traditional Chinese martial arts philosophy and Taoist beliefs about life energy, later adapted and popularized in Japanese manga and anime.

Specific Anime Examples:

Dragon Ball Series:

  • Golden Aura: Super Saiyan transformations produce brilliant golden ki

  • Blue Aura: Super Saiyan Blue features intense blue energy

  • Color Coding: Each character has distinctive aura colors (Goku=orange/gold, Vegeta=blue/white, Piccolo=white/yellow)

Naruto:

  • Chakra Cloaks: Nine-Tails chakra appears as orange/red energy

  • Susanoo: Massive energy constructs surrounding characters

  • Sage Mode: Golden energy indicating natural energy mastery

Bleach:

  • Reiatsu: Spiritual pressure manifests as colored auras

  • Bankai Releases: Dramatic energy explosions with character-specific colors

  • Hollow Masks: Dark, sinister energy patterns

Demon Slayer:

  • Breathing Techniques: Elemental auras matching sword styles

  • Demon Marks: Distinctive patterns with glowing effects

  • Hinokami Kagura: Fire-based energy visualization

Jujutsu Kaisen:

  • Cursed Energy: Dark, ominous auras around sorcerers

  • Domain Expansion: Massive energy fields creating alternate spaces

  • Technique Activation: Specific colors for different cursed techniques

Yu Yu Hakusho:

  • Spirit Energy: Characters emit colored auras based on their power

  • Yusuke's Spirit Gun: Blue energy concentration

  • Demon Energy: Dark, threatening auras for antagonists

My Hero Academia:

  • Quirk Activation: Energy effects matching individual superpowers

  • One For All: Green lightning-like energy crackling around the user

  • Character-Specific: Each hero has unique visual effects

Applications in Storytelling:

  • Power Scaling: Aura intensity shows character growth

  • Emotional States: Colors reflect anger, determination, or fear

  • Battle Dynamics: Clashing auras create visual tension

  • Transformation Markers: Aura changes indicate new power levels

This visual technique has become a fundamental element in action anime, serving both aesthetic and narrative purposes by making internal character development externally visible to audiences.

Hollywood glamour era, a time when actresses embodied sophistication through meticulously styled hair, flawless makeup, and opulent jewelry. Beauty standards emphasized polished waves, bold red lips, and dramatic eyes, often framed by diamond accessories and luxurious fabrics. This period celebrated a cinematic ideal of femininity—refined, poised, and irresistibly captivating under the spotlight.

I really had fun testing this one. I'm a fiend for this stuff.

Str 0.5 to 1

eyeliner, red lips, mole under eye

Works best with black hair/red hair, because the part is hard to see in blonde hair. That being said, will work with any hair.

name: The Bread Aisle/Murrlogic1 Wonder Bread Meme
description:
All CivitAI generation of my LoRAs is on hold until/unless CivitAI stops banning an increasing number of things to appease supposed "payment processors".

Please no image posts! This is incredibly cursed and I don't want to know or see what you people do with it.

Prompt wonderbread to activate the LoRA. This LoRA generates a person on a bread aisle with shelves full of Wonder Bread, with a shopping cart full of bread. Optionally add holding cellphone to your prompt for the full effect.

Issues:

There were very few (surprisingly) images to train this on, and that's AFTER photoshopping away all the text and speech bubbles (feel free to appreciate the included training data). It's as good as I could make it, but it's not going to be the best quality LoRA. It will have trouble with hands. It will have trouble understanding what a shopping cart looks like. It will try to put the word "WONDER" on every damn shirt it sees. But this wasn't made to be high quality or popular. It was made for the meme.

I am an awful human being.

name: High_Heel_Bodysuit
description:
Make high heels Integrate with bodysuit and no more detached high heel shoes disrupt the overall harmony and integrity of the bodysuit.

It is very uncomfortable to see the bodysuit girl has barefoot and wearing high heels detached from the beautiful, smooth and integrated suit, what even more irritating is the foot covered by latex and the fucking high heel sandals on it!!! I can't stand this outrageous situation, so I made this lora to prevent something in the shape of shoes or boots emerge on the smooth bodysuit.

Smooth bodysuit without any footwear:

  • Positive: smooth h33l,h33l5uit,heelsuit,seamless,

  • Negative: wrinkled ankle fabric,thigh boots,shoes,footwear,foot seams,

Smooth thigh boots:

  • Positive: smooth h33l,high heel boots,thigh boots,seamless,

  • Negative: wrinkled ankle fabric,foot seams,

Bodysuit without any cutout, seams or stitching

  • Positive: smooth h33l,h33l5uit,heelsuit,seamless,

  • Negative: exposed skin,clothing cutout,seams,seamed,foot seams,highleg seams,stomach seams,

It's quite a shame that there is no specific word to describe the concept that heels directly installed on the bodysuit. So I try to name it as "HeelSuit" and tag my training images with "Smooth H33l" and "H33l5uit".

So you do not need adding "high heels" to positive prompt when using my lora. Using heelsuit, smooth h33l and h33l5uit as trigger word instead.

The "wrinkled ankle fabric" in negative word could make the ankle of bodysuit smoother. Adding "[bodypart] seams" and "clothing cutout" to negative also help the bodysuit to be more integrated.

name: Fancy Braided Twintails
description:
To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for Homemade Oatmeal Cream Pies ~

Ingredients

For the Cookies

  • 1 cup unsalted butter softened

  • ¾ cup firmly packed light brown sugar

  • ½ cup granulated sugar

  • 2 large eggs

  • 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

  • 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour

  • 1 teaspoon baking soda

  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

  • ½ teaspoon salt

  • 3 cups quick or old fashioned oats

For the Cream Filling

  • ¾ cup unsalted butter softened

  • 2 ½ cups confectioners’ sugar sifted

  • 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

  • 1 tablespoon milk or half and half

Instructions

Preheat oven to 350°F. Line cookie sheets with parchment paper.

In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, or in a large bowl with an electric mixer, cream together butter and sugars until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Add in eggs and vanilla and mix until combined.

1 cup unsalted butter,3/4 cup firmly packed light brown sugar,1/2 cup granulated sugar,2 large eggs,1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt. Slowly add the flour mixture to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Add in oats and mix until incorporated.

1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour,1 teaspoon baking soda,1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,1/2 teaspoon salt,3 cups quick or old fashioned oats

To make large cookies, use a large cookie scoop (about 3 tablespoons) to drop dough onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake in preheated oven for 13-15 minutes or until golden brown. To make small cookies, use a medium cookie scoop (about 1.5 tablespoons) of dough per cookie and bake for 10-12 minutes.

Allow cookies to sit on cookie sheets for about 5 minutes before removing them to a wire rack to cool completely. Once cookies have cooled completely, prepare the cream filling.

Prepare the Cream Filling:

In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat butter on medium-high speed for about 5 minutes. This process will lighten the color of the butter and ensure you buttercream in extra fluffy.

3/4 cup unsalted butter

Turn the speed down to low and gradually add in the powdered sugar. Continue mixing on low speed until the powdered sugar is completely incorporated. Add in vanilla extract and milk and mix until combined.

2 1/2 cups confectioners’ sugar,1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract,1 tablespoon milk or half and half

Turn mixer back up to medium-high speed and beat the mixture for an additional 3-5 minutes. If needed, add in a little more milk or half-and-half 1 teaspoon at a time until you reach the consistency you desire.

To assemble the cookies, pipe or spread the cream filling on the flat side of half of the cookies and put the remaining cookies on top.

🔸Recommended Prompts:

(Positive Prompts) lynsticker, outline, white outline, thick outlines, simple background, black background, full body,

(Optional Prompt) chibi (for a more cute sticker style)

(Negative Prompts) none

NOTE: This model was intended to render characters with a "chibi" aesthetic, a thick white outline around the character and a solid black background. The reasoning for using a white outline and a solid black background is because black and white are contrasting colors and doing so makes it easier to remove the background from the character to create a transparent sticker. This makes is possible to photoshop them for printing, or for use in servers (like Discord) that can make use of transparent stickers.

⚠️While the model can create images of full size characters (without the "chibi" tag), the results will not come out consistently since the dataset was trained with a specific style in mind. Please keep this in mind while creating your images.

All preview images were rendered with my Personal Model.

Feel free to experiment with different checkpoints to see how it works.

🔹I spend a lot of time making these Loras, prioritizing quality over quantity, so you won't see me posting dozens of models per day. Please share your image results and comment with any feedback on the model page so I can further improve this model for everyone, and if you feel it deserves a tip, you can make a donation by purchasing a "Digital Amazon Gift Card" with any amount you feel is fair.

The Recipient Email Address should be: lindezablue@gmail.com Thank you!~💙

⚠️ All posts to my models are limited to Content Rating "PG, PG-13, and R" ONLY!

name: Build a Character
description:
Model Description:

This LoRA captures a soft-edged, alt-fashion character aesthetic with a strong emphasis on stylized anatomy, modern streetwear, and subtle emotional expression. It specializes in producing semi-realistic, anime-inspired portraits featuring bold fashion elements—striped thigh-highs, oversized sweaters, chokers, and textured hairstyles in soft pastel palettes.

The model excels at:

  • Close-up or full-body character shots

  • Blushy, doll-like expressions

  • Fashion-focused composition with layered details

  • Pale-to-medium skintones, pink or pastel hair shades, and grunge/alt accessories

  • Both male and female subjects, as well as androgynous or humanoid creature designs

  • Perfect for artists and creators looking to generate moody, stylish, character-centric imagery with a hint of surreal softness. Works well with both simple prompts and more detailed tagging systems.

    You can do solo images while keeping the style if you add these words to your negative prompt! (First remove the trigger words; "multiple angles" and "face")

  • Multiple angles

  • Extra people

Trained on realistic faceless data from film, MSZ-27, SPSB-99, SPSB-61.

name: Boss Fight
description:
"YOU- SHALL NOT- PASS!"

A LoRA for the "boss fight" vibe, specifically with one character in the foreground and their adversary further in the background, often larger and more intimidating. This LoRA captures the moment in the game when you think "uh oh" and regret not going through your inventory and upgrading your equipment before clicking "are you sure you're ready to continue?" It's the shot before the battle starts, when you first see the boss health bar fill up... five times.

The keyword is "bssfight". Although that's the main activation token, you'll want to play around with words like "perspective", "giant", "monster", "battle", and that sort of thing, because there's a decent amount of flexibility in the LoRA and using just the keyword isn't going to force the model into some very specific shot.

You'll almost always want to use some non-unitary aspect ratio, i.e. don't use a square image. It works, but I've found you can get much more stylized images either from portrait or landscape aspect ratios. Portrait will usually get you the hero on the bottom and a large adversary above them. Landscape will usually get you a hero that's off to one side and larger in the framing, appearing closer to the camera. I personally prefer landscape mode generally, and I've found that 1344x768 can be a good one to use.

name: Exaggerated Fear/Blue Blush (Facial Expression)
description:
When trying to create facial expressions for characters, I've tended to notice it has trouble depicting fear or anxiety. In cartoons or anime, when a character expresses shock or fear, their face may gets this sort of blue gradient across their forehead. I don't really know how to describe it, but I like to think of it as a blue blush. I wanted to recreate this expression for characters.

The trigger word is: w0rr13d3lu3l1n3

You can subsequently tag: blue facial hue, scribble eyes,

The tags I used in each of the images are as follows:

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), disgusted,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), scared,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), anxious,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), scared, screaming, wavy mouth,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, closed eyes, (blue facial hue), sweating, nervous smile,

I removed scribble eyes from some prompts, and you can as well if you wish.

modelVersions.name: V1
modelVersions.description:
When trying to create facial expressions for characters, I've tended to notice it has trouble depicting fear or anxiety. In cartoons or anime, when a character expresses shock or fear, their face may gets this sort of blue gradient across their forehead. I don't really know how to describe it, but I like to think of it as a blue blush. I wanted to recreate this expression for characters.

The trigger word is: w0rr13d3lu3l1n3

You can subsequently tag: blue facial hue, scribble eyes,

The tags I used in each of the images are as follows:

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), disgusted,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), scared,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), anxious,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, scribble eyes, (blue facial hue), scared, screaming, wavy mouth,

w0rr13d3lu3l1n3, closed eyes, (blue facial hue), sweating, nervous smile,

I removed scribble eyes from some prompts, and you can as well if you wish.

For a more classic look, you can also tag "wavy mouth" or "no pupils." However, they are tags and not triggers.
